item.title: Void War
item.description:
Title: Void War
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Tundra
Publisher: Tundra
Release Date: Jun 2, 2025




About This Game

Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.

Manage Your Ship

Your starship is a mighty and terrible vessel, brimming with arcane technology and devastating weapons. Harness your ship's weapons, modules, and reactor power to maximize your combat potential.

Powerful Combos

Arrange your upgrades into powerful combos and use them to surgically dismantle your enemies. But watch out. They can do exactly the same to you.

Build Your Crew

Enlist crew from six different factions. Customize them with a vast array of wargear and engage in bloody, strategic boarding actions against enemy craft. Watch them crush their foes or die horrifically in the frenzy of void warfare.

Everchanging Galaxy

Experience hundreds of randomly generated encounters. Navigate through a brutal and unrelenting galaxy, weaving together a new story with every run.

Dark Techno-Gothic Future

Meet technocultist magi, Imperial deserters, demon lords and more. Recruit them, fight them, and make choices that impact the state of your ship and the lives of your crew.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Void War contains blood and gore, intense violence, and mature themes.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
    • Storage: 250 MB available space

item.title: Voidsayer
item.description:
Title: Voidsayer
Genre: Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Pavel Auseitasau
Publisher: indie.io
Franchise: indie.io
Release Date: Jun 2, 2025




About This Game

Voidsayer is a dark monster-taming jRPG, set in a world cursed by the Abyss. As its malevolent influence spreads and consumes the world, take on the role of a valiant warrior and fight back using over one hundred types of powerful tameable monsters. Refine their power with gear, special effects, and of course, evolve them into higher classes of monsters. Cross a vast interconnected world full of challenges and random events, all procedurally generated to ensure no two playthroughs are the same.

This is the classic turn-based jRPG monster tamer with multiple modern twists on the gameplay and an uncompromising approach to difficulty: Every fight is a challenge, every random event is a risk of crippling your team, and resources are extremely limited in a dark, cursed world where everything will eventually be consumed by the Abyss.


Or will it?

  • Dark, Complex Monster Taming: Each of the one hundred monsters you can catch is defined by a sophisticated stat system, which includes genetic predispositions and distinct personalities affecting their performance. Each can be further tuned and enhanced with carefully selected gear and other upgrades. They will need it, even if they evolve into higher forms.

  • Challenging Turn-Based Combat: Monsters are one side of the coin. The other is a large catalog of attack moves, effects, passives, combined with an easy to understand type system. Grass is beaten by fire, but fire is beaten by water - and it doesn't affect just damage dealt, but can dramatically change the course of battle. Strategic thinking and creative tactics are essential to victory.

  • Procedurally-Generated Levels Full of Twists: Every level is unique, with a generated map combining countless random encounters, pitched battles, and unforeseen events that can dramatically alter the gameplay. Your carefully-prepped and upgraded team might suddenly suffer injury - or trigger an abyssal distortion with severe consequences. Or... Maybe you'll encounter an opportunity that will require careful consideration of your options.

  • Bespoke, Powerful Bosses: A boss is not just a particularly powerful monster. Every boss is confronted at the end of a dedicated level, full of unique challenges reflecting their might. They range from tweaking the underlying gameplay slightly to completely upending gameplay you're used to, forcing your monsters to adapt - or die.

  • Settlement System: Hope is not yet completely snuffed out, as some human settlements still exist, strongholds of humanity against the encroaching Abyss. Your base of operations can be upgraded with materials brought back from each expedition, upgrading buildings to enhance their functionality or unlock new ways to tackle the Abyssal threat.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
    • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
item.description:
Title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Trese Brothers
Publisher: Trese Brothers
Release Date: Jun 2, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 17, 2023




About This Game


A modern tactical RPG with some of our favorite elements: gridless movement, environmental cover, specialized overwatch, initiative manipulation and more. Independent enemy unit AI opens up a world of creative stealth options; pick them off one by one, stage diversions, or use advanced tech to sneak right by them.

Combat is challenging and in-depth. Powerful abilities, tricked out weapons, and smart coordination can give you an edge, but once you go loud expect things to escalate. Move fast and avoid getting pinned down to accomplish your objectives and get out alive.




The ecosystem has collapsed. Only 112 cities remain, sheltering under massive domes or inside of mountains. Artificial consciousness has been created, killed, and outlawed at a global level. Megacorporations, nanotech and quantum computing have radically altered the world… and your character is one of the few equipped to handle it.




Choose your jobs to build your rep without taking on too much heat. Work your network of underworld contacts to trade favors, pay bribes, and gain advantages before taking on a heist. Plan your path through multi-stage missions, and commit your crew to legwork that could reveal new opportunities or threats.




Balance factions, favors, reputation and more. Rivals, fixers, arms dealers and corporate big shots... who you work for, who you fail or betray, all of it can open and close opportunities for you. Watch your heat, and try to make sure more people owe you than the other way around.




Extensive talent trees, more than 40 multiclass combinations available at full launch, weapon modding, safehouse upgrades, evolving character traits and more combine to give players endless ways to build a crew that can take on any job. Rich visual customization (hair, outfits, faces, eyes, tattoos, facial hair, accessories, color options for everything, and more) & naming lets you personalize any of your characters.




Your squad members evolve as you play, shaped by your choices, their injuries, interactions, even their presence on some missions. Inspired by years of tabletop RPGs, our custom-built Casting Director story engine uses all this information to choose and place squad members and NPCs into world events and storylines it selects for you on each playthrough. Who will end up a betrayer, a friend in need, or the villain this time? Create new squads, discover new stories, and watch how your choices make it all fit together.




Trese Brothers Games makes deep, highly-replayable strategy games & RPGs. Cyber Knights: Flashpoint is our 9th and best yet, made possible by our dedicated fans and player support from our previous games. We're long-time fans of cyberpunk and are thrilled to bring together both a fresh take and so many of the genre's classic themes around some of our favorite gameplay.

Sound like your kind of game?

Grab it now while the launch discount lasts!

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

Linux

item.title: POPUCOM
item.description:
Title: POPUCOM
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual
Developer: Hypergryph
Publisher: Gryph Frontier
Release Date: Jun 1, 2025




About This Game

POPUCOM is a multiplayer co-op platform adventure game. As an adventurer, you are summoned to an unknown planet to embark on an exoplanet adventure with your friends. You will face various enemies and use engaging items and techniques to eliminate threats and restore the world to its former glory.




Work together with your friends to take on a variety of challenges. Effective cooperation and strong teamwork are the only ways forward. Whether it's facing powerful enemies or tackling complex puzzles, you'll need to work together to triumph!




Color plays a crucial role in this fantastical world. It is key to everything from puzzle solving to combat. You'll need to switch colors to activate mechanisms and solve puzzles, and shoot Pomu gel in different colors to change the surroundings and impact enemies. Master the techniques of color switching and match-3 shooting to overcome puzzles and defeat enemies!




During the journey, you will acquire items known as super artifacts. Examples of these wondrous artifacts include Rollo the Bomb, Captain Kitty, Barrier Bot, and Power Kid. Each of them grants you a unique ability that helps remove obstacles and solve puzzles in your adventure.




The adventure isn't just about combat; it's also about showcasing your style! Pick from a selection of gear and cosmetics in the Closet and combine them to create your unique looks. Then you can set off on the journey in your personalized style!




In addition to the exciting battles and engaging puzzles, the game includes a number of enjoyable mini-games. Head to the in-game arcade room for some lighthearted arcade fun during breaks from the main stages.






Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400/AMD Ryzen 5 1400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 550/Intel Arc Graphics
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended. The above specs should enable you to play on Low quality preset at 1080p 30fps.
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600/AMD Ryzen 5 5500
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060/AMD Radeon RX5700 XT/Intel Arc B580
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended. The above specs should enable you to play on High quality preset at 1440p 60fps.

item.title: Farm Together 2
item.description:
Title: Farm Together 2
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Milkstone Studios
Publisher: Milkstone Studios
Franchise: Farm Together
Release Date: May 30, 2025
Early Access Release Date: May 7, 2024




About This Game

The successful farming experience is back!


Farm Together 2 improves over the original game in every way, offering a better polished experience and becoming the best way to enjoy your own farm!

Start from scratch, with a small plot, and end with a huge area that extends further than the eye can see!

Grow your farm


Grow crops, plant trees, take care of the animals, and much more! Spend your hard-earned money in new expansions to place the hundreds of new items to unlock!

Hop onto your tractor and speed up the tedious tasks with the new automatic mode!

Welcome to the town!


Pass by the town to sell the fruits of your work and earn more money to spend in decorations and upgrades.

Fulfill townspeople's requests to keep them happy and get rewards.

Chill out


Stay for as long as you want! In Farm Together 2 time advances even if you're not online, so you can be sure you'll have something to do when you come back later.

Manage your farm all by yourself, allow entrance only to your friends, or open it to the public and start cultivating together! With its simple permission system, you can invite strangers to your farm without risk.

Customize your farm and your looks


You'll have plenty of customization items at your disposal: Fences, roads, buildings, decorations... Show your gardening and decoration skills to your neighbours!

And don't forget about your clothes! Customize your avatar and your tractor to your liking, and go visit your friends' farms!

Build your own house


Want a change of pace? No problem! Just enter your house and relax!

Decorate the house interior however you like, and spend some time cooking some recipes or painting.

Landscaping


Change the layout of your farm with a simple terraforming system, and add or remove hills and mountains to your liking.





Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS
